featured.text: The sandals have subsequently undergone redesign, often appearing in bright colors in line with Californian beach culture.

definition.zh_def: 重新設計，對某物進行改變或改善其外觀或功能。
definition.en_def: To design something again or differently, often to improve its appearance or functionality.
definition.example: The company decided to redesign their logo to attract a younger audience.
